description:
The DebConf24 Debian conference will be held from July 28th to August 4th, 2024, in Busan, South Korea. Here’s how to attend and what you need to know.

The post DebConf24 Debian Conference to Be Held in South Korea from July 28 to August 4 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: DebConf24 Debian Conference to Be Held in South Korea from July 28 to August 4
